price: (81) And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allāh do you deny?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
